short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates weekly progress for your dining plan!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculates your weekly progress for CMU's dining plans and shows how much needs to be spent per week to stay on track.

Display information in SIO > Campus Life > Meal Plan Assignment.

Using the dropdown under "Current Semester Activity", select either "Plan" or "Flex Dollars" for the calculated information.

It DOES take into account fall/spring break for the weekly goal calculation.

For any questions or feature requests, email me!
